title: Secret Story - Casa dos Segredos
overview: Secret Story - Casa dos Segredos is a Portuguese reality show, broadcast by TVI. The program is based on the original French Secret Story, which in turn is based on the international format Big Brother. The show premiered on October 3, 2010, with the presentation of JÃºlia Pinheiro, supported by Pedro Granger and Leonor Poeiras (in the diaries and extras). Since the 2nd edition, the reality-show is presented by Teresa Guilherme.
